author: dicconzane
content:
I've only just come across your blog and wanted to applaud your commitment. I'm an amateur photographer but I'd find excuses way to easily to skip days... and eventually give up after a couple of week in all probability. I have enough trouble motivating myself to enter my blog almost daily let alone take a picture... let alone take some very good pictures (at least to my untrained eye, others may disagree but I found them aesthetically pleasing regardless). So just thought you ought to have some form of plaudit... but I'm all out of medals so this comment will have to do.

Diccon
